pageContent: Background: We evaluated inter-fraction penile bulb (PB) changes in prostate cancer (PCa) patients undergoing MR-guided RT in the post-radical prostatectomy (RP) setting.

metaData.source:
Patients' perceptions of radical prostatectomy for localized prostate cancer: a qualitative study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23662377/
